text: Gilda is a 1946 American romantic drama movie directed by Charles Vidor and starring Rita Hayworth, Glenn Ford, Joe Sawyer, Steven Geray, George Macready, Joseph Calleia, Don Douglas, Gerald Mohr. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Argentine romance movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Vidor Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Argentina
title: Gilda
